title: OMG It's Healthy
description: A very unique shop concept. The juice bar offers a large variety of healthy plant-based meal smoothies, some of which are vegan and/or gluten free, which are freshly made-in-house using water as a base. Also serves botanical teas. Carries supplements and sports nutrition. Does wellness profiles, fitness evaluations and more. Some staff members are either vegetarian or vegan. Serves no prepared food.
